FILE: cm160713v11.0.txt
DYAD: ARGENTINA - TAIWAN
RIVALRY: RIV384
DISPUTE(S): MID2579 


PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170729
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2579 

TERRMID: MID2579 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2579 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2579 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2579 from NYT 5/29/1986, Argentina fired on a Taiwanese fishing vessel that was fishing in Argentina's territorial waters and refused to be escorted to a port. Coded not maritime because the maritime boundary was not being disputed. 

ISLMID: MID2579 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2579 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2579 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2579 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2579 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2579 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:
